alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:26PM EDT until April 05 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1225 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Gregory to near Stockbridge to near Grass Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 12:09pm, the Jackson airport reported a wind gust of 63 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea around 1235 PM EDT. Dexter around 1245 PM EDT. Ann Arbor and Whitmore Lake around 1250 PM EDT. Ypsilanti, Salem and Dixboro around 100 PM EDT. Canton around 115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hudson Mills, Delhi Mills, Barton Hills, Lyndon Township and Hudson Mills Metropark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
